message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor to start.
Alice, your starting offer was a bit too lopsided. I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor.  Think carefully, the pot shrinks next round!
Bob, let's be realistic. This back and forth is only hurting us. I propose a 50/50 split to end this now before we lose more money.
